tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_instruments (
 instrument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 instrument_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 instrument_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
 data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 instrument_id INT NOT NULL,
 date DATE NOT NULL,
 closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 volume INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE correlation_analysis (
 analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 analysis_date DATE NOT NULL,
 correlation_coefficient DECIMAL(5, 4) NOT NULL,
 result_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CorrelationData (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument1_id INT,
    instrument2_id INT,
    correlation_coefficient DECIMAL(5, 4),
    correlation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CorrelationData (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument1_id INT,
    instrument2_id INT,
    correlation_value DECIMAL,
    correlation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TradeExecution (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    instrument_id INT,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices ( 
    date DATE, 
    symbol VARCHAR(10), 
    open_price DECIMAL, 
    close_price DECIMAL, 
    volume INT 
)

CREATE TABLE stock_correlations ( 
    symbol1 VARCHAR(10), 
    symbol2 VARCHAR(10), 
    correlation_coefficient DECIMAL, 
    p_value DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE stock_returns ( 
    date DATE, 
    symbol VARCHAR(10), 
    daily_return DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies ( 
    strategy_id INT, 
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50), 
    description TEXT, 
    performance_metric VARCHAR(20) 
)

CREATE TABLE strategy_backtesting ( 
    backtest_id INT, 
    strategy_id INT, 
    date DATE, 
    cumulative_returns DECIMAL 
)
